description:
Thanks to its Adaptive Cushioning Technology, the Sawtooth X Mid provides a smooth ride without sacrificing traction or balance. Grippy lugs keep you upright in muddy and rocky sections, and a waterproof-breathable membrane means feet stay dry even when Mother Nature has other ideas.

  • Nubuck leather and abrasion-resistant mesh upper balances protection and breathability
  • Oboz BDry waterproof-breathable membrane keeps rain out and lets sweat escape
  • Asymmetrical collar articulates with the ankle for a comfortable, chafe-free stride
  • Rubber heel counter adds protection and stability
  • O-Fit insole has multi-density EVA pods for comfort and cushion
  • Dual-density EVA midsole provides cushioning and support
  • Nylon shank adds stability on uneven terrain
  • Outsole is Sawtooth carbon rubber in a high-friction compound for durable traction
  • Asymmetrical lug pattern for optimal propulsion and braking
name: Oboz Sawtooth X Mid B-Dry Light Trail Shoes - Men's
